title: 怎么修改物品ID啊!!!!
author: a395470224
txt_content:
本帖最后由 a395470224 于 2014-8-6 08:54 编辑 

1.7.2
潘马斯的世界和雷格科技ID冲突   求教怎么修改啊!!!{:10_503:}{:10_503:}
下面是崩溃说明


---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// You should try our sister game, Minceraft!

和冲突文件

    bonecraft{1.7.2b} [Pam's BoneCraft] (潘马斯Pam's BoneCraft 1.7.2b[CN].zip) Unloaded->Constructed->Errored

    desertcraft{1.7.2b} [Pam's DesertCraft] (潘马斯Pam's DesertCraft 1.7.2c[CN].zip) Unloaded->Constructed->Errored

replies.author: 看那的猪
replies.txt_content: .minecraft\config里找到pam开头的cfg文件用记事本打开，里面有修改id的选项
